name: Panasonic Network Camera Image
summary: Learn about .PNC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PNC files are created when images are recorded by a Panasonic network camera and downloaded to its SD card. You can configure the camera settings for how PNC files are captured including the image resolution and the frequency of images captured.

The PNC images can be transferred to a computer using the camera's SD card. You can download the free Panasonic SD Viewer and use it to view the PNC files. You can also use the program to save the image to a more common format, such as JPEG, GIF, or PNG.

description: A PNC file is an image created by Panasonic network video cameras, which are typically used for security purposes. It contains an image saved in the PNC format, which is similar to the JPEG format. PNC files can only be viewed with the Panasonic Network Camera SD Viewer.
